name: Janecal
body:
### Not just a calendar.
A good application should not only be used to query the calendar date, but you can show the beauty of the world. Why not enjoy a calendar with a beautiful sceneryï¼ŸCalendar also can be sexy.

![s1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lapsong/lapsong.github.io/master/images/s1.png)

### Practical functions
To provide a elegant experience, we just keep the calendar function in Janecal without reminders and To-do list.  It is just a calendar,  which is probably the best alternative of the system calendar app.

### Development technology
Janecal is build on Electron, which is a framework for creating native applications with web technologies like JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

### Support or Contact
In order to express my gratitude for your support, I promise that I will provide the permanent after-sales service for you.
If you get any problems with Janecal, please contact with me `lapsong13@foxmail.com`.I am looking forward to your valuable suggestions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
